capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Neville the other day and I found out that he's actually a guy. I mean, it's not surprising really, but still nice to know. He's definitely a confident person when it comes to his identity, which is great to see.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm certain of his age. It seems pretty clear-cut, doesn't it?
